net.objectof.connector

Interface Connector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnector, AbstractSQLConnector, IH2Connector, IJDBCConnector, IJsonConnector, IMySQLConnector, IPostgresConnector, ISQLiteConnector

    public interface Connector

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Connector.Initialize
      Enumeration indicating when the Connector should initialize an empty database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Package createPackage(org.w3c.dom.Document schema, Connector.Initialize initialize)
      Returns a Package based on the Parameter values of this Connector, creating a new Package if it does not already exist.

      Returns a Package based on the Parameter values of this Connector, creating a new Package if it does not already exist.

      Returns a Package based on the Parameter values of this Connector

      Returns the Parameter with the given name.

      Returns a List of all Parameters for this Connector

      Returns a String identifying the type of backend this Connector uses.
      boolean hasPackage(java.lang.String name)
      Checks to see if the configured database contains a repository with the given name
      void initializeContainer()
      When creating a new container (eg database, not repository), this can be used to populate it with the required tables and views.
      boolean isContainerEmpty()
      Checks to see if the container (eg database, not repository) contains any tables, views, etc...

      A convenience method for setParameter(String, String) which accepts a map from parameter name to parameter value

    • Method Detail

      • getPackage

        Package getPackage()
            throws ConnectorException
        Returns a Package based on the Parameter values of this Connector
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        ConnectorException

      • createPackage

        Package createPackage(org.w3c.dom.Document schema,
                      Connector.Initialize initialize)
               throws ConnectorException
        Returns a Package based on the Parameter values of this Connector, creating a new Package if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        schema - a Document representing a Package schema
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        ConnectorException

      • createPackage

        Package createPackage(java.io.InputStream schema,
                      Connector.Initialize initialize)
               throws ConnectorException
        Returns a Package based on the Parameter values of this Connector, creating a new Package if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        schema - an InputStram of a Document representing a Package schema
        initialize - Indicates if this database (not repository) should be initialized if it is empty as determined by isContainerEmpty()
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        ConnectorException

      • getPackageName

        java.lang.String getPackageName()
        Returns the qualified name of this Package

      • isContainerEmpty

        boolean isContainerEmpty()
                  throws ConnectorException
        Checks to see if the container (eg database, not repository) contains any tables, views, etc... (not just ones used by objectof).
        Returns:
        true if the database is empty, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ConnectorException

      • initializeContainer

        void initializeContainer()
                  throws ConnectorException
        When creating a new container (eg database, not repository), this can be used to populate it with the required tables and views.
        Throws:
        ConnectorException

      • getPackageNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPackageNames()
                                          throws ConnectorException
        Attempts to connect to the configured database and read a list of all repository names.
        Returns:
        A list of all repository names in the configured database, if provided.
        Throws:
        ConnectorException

      • getParameters

        java.util.List<Parameter> getParameters()
        Returns a List of all Parameters for this Connector

      • getParameter

        Parameter getParameter(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the Parameter with the given name. If no such Parameter exists, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Parameter to retrieve

      • setParameter

        void setParameter(java.lang.String parameter,
                  java.lang.String value)
        Set the value for a Parameter with the given name. If no parameter with the given name exists, no action is performed.
        Parameters:
        parameter - the name of the Parameter to set
        value - the value for the Parameter

      • setParameters

        void setParameters(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> values)
        A convenience method for setParameter(String, String) which accepts a map from parameter name to parameter value
        Parameters:
        values - a map of parameter name->value

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of this Connector. The name should default to the type, but can be anything.

      • setName

        void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of this Connector

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Returns a String identifying the type of backend this Connector uses. This should be unique across all Connector implementations.

      • hasPackage

        boolean hasPackage(java.lang.String name)
            throws ConnectorException
        Checks to see if the configured database contains a repository with the given name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the repository to check for
        Returns:
        true if the repository exists, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ConnectorException
